item.title: How to Install LAMP Server on Arch Linux (Apache+PHP+MariaDB) [2021]

Install Apache $ sudo pacman -S apache Save an close the file. $ sudo systemctl enable --now httpd $ sudo systemctl status httpd Edit /srv/http/index.html and put following lines: <html> <title>Welcome</title> <body> <h2>Welcome to Apache test page!
